title: Message from the President to the Congress Regarding the Census | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
January 05, 2011

 



Message from the President to the Congress Regarding the Census





	TO THE CONGRESS OF THE UNITED STATES:

	Pursuant to title 2, United States Code, section 2a(a), I transmit herewith the statement showing the apportionment population for each State as of April 1, 2010, and the number of Representatives to which each State would be entitled.

	                                     BARACK OBAMA
	THE WHITE HOUSE,
	  January 5, 2011.
